## Plotting Map
```{r Leaflet}
library(magrittr)
library(leaflet)
my_map=leaflet()%>%
  addTiles()%>%
  addMarkers(lat =28.7041,lng=77.1025,popup = "DELHI")%>%
  addMarkers(lat =19.0760,lng=72.8777,popup = "MUMBAI")%>%
  addMarkers(lat =8.5241,lng=76.9366,popup = "TRIVANRUM")
my_map
```
